fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
During the day, select a weapon to use the next night.

MUSKET - Kill your target if they have an attack stat above None on their role card, do nothing otherwise. (Jester, Veteran, Crusader, Trapper included, all technicalities.)
(Physical, Powerful Attack)

Nautical Scope - View all visitors to your target, and view who your target visits.
(Physical)

Cannon - Do a basic attack rampage at your targets house, you are revealed to the town. You can do this only once.
(Astral)
